/**
 * utils
 */ /**
 * router:
 * /boss
 * /expert
 * /bossInfo
 * /expertInfo
 *
 * check if info done? user.header hold value or not
 * check the type of user? user.type
 */export function getRedirectTo(type,header){var path='';if(type==='boss'){path='/boss';}else{path='/expert';}if(!header){path+='Info';}return path;}
